name: Second Samsara
description:
Controls:

Space/Enter: End turn

Numbers 1-3 to select weapons.

Left click: Select a unit to control it / fire at enemy with the selected weapon.

Right click: Move selected unit to valid tile.

Unless the allied unit is magic-locked: The top-most "lock description" can be clicked to unleash the spell that he/she is currently thinking about. Some spells may or may not require not having attacked already.

Can be played entirely with a mouse.

--

Three worlds had different ideas of what heaven would be like. These ideas were founded in what they couldn't have, or known as the "locks". They are:

Magic: Cannot mold matter to willpower, or "cast magic".

Force: Cannot use industrial age machines.

Skin: Animated Skeletons. No nor flesh, muscles nor organs. This lack allows them to easily add in cybernetics, though they are still brittle.

--

No sounds for the moment.
